note.p: Daughter of Sir Andrew Buchanan, diplomatist, and his first wife, Frances Katherine Mellish. Born in St Petersburg, Russia. Married John Willis Clark at Holy Trinity, Chelsea, in 1873. Buried with her husband in Mill Road cemetery, Cambridge.
London Metropolitan Archives P74/TRI/016 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 August 2021)
ODNB s.v. Buchanan, Andrew, and Clark, John Willis
Russia, select births and baptisms, 1755–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 August 2021)
